title: UAW Rejects Latest Offer From GM, as Setback Extends Strike
text:
With contract talks in Detroit in a critical stretch, bargainers at General Motors Co. and the United Auto Workers union clashed over competing proposals during the weekend, as they struggled to resolve the longest nationwide strike at the company in decades.

The UAW’s top bargainer for GM said Sunday morning that talks had taken “a turn for the worse,” saying that the giant auto maker had reverted back to a previously rejected proposal with only minor changes. That marked a change in tone from Friday, when negotiators expressed...
